Welcome to 8-Bit Artist, the game! This is network-only, so you'll need to log in to play!
To play, you need find an opponent. How about a quick match?

8-Bit artist is a drawing game. One player is given a word to draw and just 100 pixels and four colors to draw it in! The other player will guess, and then they trade places.
Unlike many drawing/guessing games, feel free to use numbers or symbols if it helps.
